title: The Return Gift for White Day is….?
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Rin, thank you for the chocolate last month. Here, it’s my return gift<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Nya! Eli-chan, thank you! Rin got one too from Eli-chan last month, so Rin also has a return gift. It’s this, though….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>This is….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe…. It’s the same thing Eli-chan gave Rin huh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu. It seems that we picked the same thing for each other<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehehe! It means that we get along nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yeah, that’s right<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>After this, there’s one more thing that Rin wants to do with Eli-chan….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>What might it be?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>After eating these sweets, Rin wants to go eat ramen together nya! Rin wants to teach Eli-chan the taste of eating ramen after eating sweet things nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eeeh!? Th-, that would be eating too much, Rin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
